greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of values of k, 1 <= k <= n, with A318310(k) = A318310(n).
comment: Ordinal transform of A318310, or equally, of the ordered pair [A000120(n), A033879(n)], i.e., binary weight of n & deficiency of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: ordinal_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), pt); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), pt = mapget(om, invec[i]), pt = 0); outvec[i] = (1+pt); mapput(om,invec[i],(1+pt))); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 12 2020
